title: [GAMEPLAY] Aatrox Q and Scuttle Crab Bug
body:
As any jungler should know, Scuttle Crab's MR and Armour get lowered to 10 when hard CC is applied to them (Elise E, Vi Q, Krugs stun, Nautilus passive)

However, Aatrox's Q (Dark Flight) does not apply this debuff to the Scuttle Crab and the crab still retains its 60 MR and Armour. 

Steps to Reproduce:

Play Aatrox on Summoner's Rift
Land the centre of the Q onto the Scuttle Crab (make sure it knocks up the crab)
Notice the crab's defensive stats do not change.

This surely is a bug as I see no reason why Aatrox's Q cannot debuff Scuttle Crab while virtually everything else can. {{item:3070}} {{champion:266}} {{item:3070}}
